mapper.select: SELECT FUNDING_NO AS projectNo, FUNDING_NAME AS projectName, TO_CHAR(FUNDING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS projectEnd, FUNDING_CURRENT_SUM AS projectPrice, DIV_NO AS DIV_NO, FUNDING_FILE_PATH AS projectImg FROM FUNDING JOIN FUNDING_FILE USING(FUNDING_NO) WHERE FUNDING_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT PROJECT_NO, DONATION_TITLE, TO_CHAR(DONATION_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), DONATION_CASH, DIV_NO, DONATION_IMGPATH FROM DONATION WHERE DONATION_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, GRP_END, ORDER_PRICE, G.DIV_NO, THUMBPATH FROM GROUP_TBL G JOIN PRICE_TBL USING (PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, TO_CHAR(AUCTION_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ORDER_PRICE, A.DIV_NO, AUCTION_PIC FROM AUCTION_TBL A JOIN PRICE_TBL USING (PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
